2 Job Purpose 
Support the after sales team in generating new business and processing existing 
commitments.  Carry out and support the processing of new sales into the business using 
the MRP system (Syspro) including the responsibility for sales order input through to 
satisfactory delivery and part billing.  Generate new quotations in sale of spare parts and 
PPM packages.  Visit customer sites carry out sales presentations and customer surveys 
and assist in growing and developing after sales business opportunities. 
  
3 Duties and key responsibilities 
 
1. Aftermarket Business Development 
 Visit customers and give on-site presentations on the importance of holding critical 
spares, regular servicing requirements and up-grade/ relocation products and services 
 Liaise and assist with customers during factory acceptance tests to discuss and 
proactively sell new spare parts and service requirements 
 Manage the interaction of clients, suppliers and internal bodies as necessary to fulfill 
duties 
 Proactively manage key customer accounts and seek new business opportunities 
 Grow sales opportunities with development of OEM relationships and aftersales 
marketing 
 
2. Up-grade Sales  
 
 Attend site to review up-grade enquiries and formulate a quotation and costing  
 Produce and process quotations for Up-grade Orders in line with the department sales 
plan 
 Effective and proactive follow up on all Up-grade quotations to customers 
 Assist in the end of the month sales input and profit reports 
 Manage Syspro reports of outgoing quotes/ PPM/ or up-grades and ensure timely follow 
up of enquiries

3. Project Management 
 Project manage Aftermarket Up-grades to deliver in line with customer and business 
expectations 
 Deliver monthly Sales Plan and gross profit targets for Aftermarket Projects 
 Carry out Customer meetings and produce necessary reports/quotations for follow up 
actions 
 Provide a technical solution to clients 
 Generate quotations and specifications in line with the business and customer 
requirements for upgrades/relocations to existing capital equipment 
 
4. General 
 Share expertise and keep up to date with developments 
 Maintain an effective working relationship with all teams within the business 
 Contribute to the ongoing development of the business, its people and processes 
 Participate in other duties as and when required 
 Comply with all policies and procedures within the company 
 Carry out all duties with regard to and ensuring equal opportunity 
 Work with all employees within the company in the fulfillment of our aims 
 Ensure that you remain compliant with health and safety regulations and accepted safe 
practice at all times.  Report any health and safety issues or contraventions witnessed 
anywhere within the business to your manager
